description_html:
Inspired by modern European chandeliers, this chandelier offers plenty of eye-catching appeal. The bold look of the minimalistic, multi-arm frame comes in a dark satin brass finish. Globe bulbs pointed up and down are arranged at the end of each arm.

• 37" wide x 23 1/2" deep x 19" high.
• Canopy is 5" wide x 2 1/2" high.
• Weighs 11 lbs.
• Includes one 6" and three 12" downrods, and 12-feet of clear wire.
• Sloped ceiling adaptable.
• Includes sixteen 40 watt type B bulbs.
• Dark satin brass finish.
product_name: Clark Satin Brass 16-Light Chandelier by Possini Euro Design
